feeds.title: EF Education First - The Global Intern 2010
feeds.description: XML feeds from Twitter timeline, Twitter search, Facebook, Google Alerts and EF.Com DB Mon Jul 26 11:19:38 EDT 2010

entry.text: RT #theglobalintern Alumno de UAG ganó beca de EF para hacer prácticas en Nueva York | http://bit.ly/9QqHCL
The EF Global Intern 2010 also awards 10 more contestants in the Jury’s 10 Favourites list, those selected receive a free flight ticket.
Two additional awards for the 2nd and 3rd global place: they win a language course abroad - www.ef.com/globalintern #theglobalintern
The EF Global Intern 2010 winner prize is an internship in three destinations around the world for a total of three months.
Global Intern 2010 -The result. Check out the 2010 winner at www.ef.com/globalintern #theglobalintern
Deadline for your video submission is 23rd of April. Still time for you to be The EF Global Intern 2010. www.ef.com/globalintern

entry.user: EF Global Intern - Shape your career!
entry.text: Hello everyone! We have an EF Global Intern 2010: http://fb.ef.com/globalintern! The lucky winner will do an internship with EF in three different countries. The two runner-ups win a language course abroad...

entry.user: EF Global Intern - Shape your career!
entry.text: Hey Global Interns. We have picked the lucky winners for each country, check out their videos here: http://www.ef.com/globalintern/ . We'll announce the global winner on Friday, stay tuned :-)

entry.user: EF Global Intern - Shape your career!
entry.text: Hey Global Intern's :-) The submission deadline for your entry is today.... Next week Tuesday the country finalists will be listed here and at www.ef.com/globalintern. Stay tuned!

entry.user: EF Global Intern - Shape your career!
entry.text: Tell us How this experience will change you career - www.ef.com/globalintern

entry.user: EF Global Intern - Shape your career!
entry.text: Deadline for your video submission is 23rd of April. Still time for you to be The EF Global Intern 2010. www.ef.com/globalintern

entry.user: EF Global Intern - Shape your career!
entry.text: Contestants, is time to upload your video. Go ahead and tell us How this experience will change you career , and convince us why you should the Global Intern 2010.
